properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 7:33PM CST until January 14 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Obion River...S.F. of the Forked
Deer River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the S.F. of the Forked Deer River at Jackson
* until Monday January 13.
* At 7 PM Sunday the stage was 34.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 34.2 feet on Monday January 13.
* Flood stage is 34.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Sunday January 12 and will
continue rising to near 34.2 feet by Monday January 13. The river
will fall below flood stage later Monday January 13.
* At 34.0 feet...Businesses along Westover Road are affected by flood
waters.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
